Name: Statuette
Description: The fine limestone block statuette of the official Amenemheb, seated with his cloak drawn around him. A false beard is carved on his chin and on either side of his wig are the figures of Thoth and Anubis, standing with one arm raised. Between his hands, which each hold a 'kheru' baton, is carved the cartouche of Merenptah. A single vertical line of inscription is carved down the front of the block, the two sides are filled with text. There is a further inscription on the plinth at the rear of the statue.
